excerpt:
So last night my buddy Bob, aka Macross, aka director / producer
/ host / tech / janitor of IPM Radio, turned 30 last night. Lots of
music, drinks, and monkeys. Can’t believe I’ve known this
guy for like 14 years. Come take a look at some photos of the party
that was broadcast live from his basement.
title: Birthday party for Bob!
content:
So last night, my buddy Bob (aka Macross, aka director / producer / host / tech / janitor of IPM Radio) turned 30. Lots of music, drinks, and monkeys. Can't believe I've known this guy for like 14 years. Come take a look at some photos of the party that was broadcast live from his basement:

Archived Comments

  • Donovan Preston
    2004-05-16T07:03:30
    I have the same PowerBook and Negativland shirt as this guy: http://www.decafbad.com/photos/bob-turns-30/Pages/IMG_2507_JPG.html Spooky...
        </li>

    </ul>
